topRight.title: CV Template Use
topRight.body: I also have experience of being used in CV templates. Use the GitHub link to the left of this paragraph to find out more!

bottomLeft.title: Stock Image
bottomLeft.body: One of my greatest assets is the fact that I am, in fact, a stock image. This image is inserted by a direct URL to the (roaylty-free) shutterstock image used in this example, but can be replaced with any other URL.

bottomRight.title: Customisation
bottomRight.body: You may want to customise the sizes of elements in this section. Use the 'avatarSize' prop to set a custom width for the avatar, or the 'topSplitRatio' and 'bottomSplitRatio' props to change where the multicolumn split lies.
